Sec. 33-163.8. Utilities and services.
Each dwelling unit shall be independently served by separate heating, air conditioning, sewer, water, electric power, gas, and other facility and utility services, wherever such utilities and services are provided, and no dwelling unit shall be in any way dependent upon such services or utility lines located within another unit. All dwelling units shall be connected to water and sewer lines and all electrical and telephone lines in the development site shall be placed underground. Proper and adequate access for firefighting purposes, and access to service areas to provide garbage and waste collection and for other necessary services, shall be provided.
